post.author: cheetahtec@gmail.com
post.title: Derby Deeds Podcast Episode #193
post.content:
It’s time for THE BIG O!

You can download the show directly by right clicking on the link below and choosing “Save Link As”, or just click to stream it.
DerbyDeeds.com – Episode #193

 

  • 0:00:00 – Show Intro & Shout Outs!
  • 0:04:50 –Quick Hits, brought to you by NOTORIOUS R.E.D.
  • 0:25:00 – Phone Topic #1 – Crowdfunding & Roller Derby
  • 0:35:00 – Phone Topic #2 – THE Derby Deeds Event Desk at the BIG O
  • 0:47:30 – We talk about The Thin Air Throwdown!
  • 0:49:00 – Interview with Puss N Boots about the Brew HaHa Matchups!
  • 0:59:00 – Show Close

Our Quick Hits are brought to you by Notorious by friend of the show TARA ARMOV & Notorious RED.
Smell clean, even if you play dirty! Ask for it in your local skate shop, or head to NotoriousRED.com…

In the quick hits this week, we talked about Frisky Sour’s GUIDE TO EUGENE!

Watch this video!! RIGHT MEOW!

ALSO, it’s the FIRST OF MAY!!

This week’s photo is from friend of the show Russ Desaulniers!

This week’s cast:

  • Jason Megatron Burrows
  • Teeny Mussolini
  • Puss ‘n’ Boots
  • and Pitchit!

Once you’ve listened to the show, CALL US! Let us know what you think!
Call the Derby Deeds Phone Line – 864-372-9337

Don’t forget that you can subscribe via iTunes too!!
If you ARE an iTunes user, please take a few seconds to give us a rating.
The more people rate, the more impact we can have on the iTunes marketplace! =)
